items.content_html: https://devbank.dev/ This challenge consists in a decentralized storage system, being sort of a folder used as a staging area, however in a extra decentralized method. Smart contract to track file specifications, size, type, up-loader, file hash. https://store.devbank.dev/ is built with JavaScript to ensure smart contracts are accomplishing the expected functionalities. Storage¬≥ permits the to add a file to a decentralized system referred to as IPFS/Filecoin System, sharing it with anybody who knows of the hash identifier. The file ownership is tracked on the blockchain. It refers to the hash, not showing the content!
items.title: devcloning/Storage-lightweight-consumer-focused-UI: https://devbank.dev/ This challenge consists in a decentralized storage system, being sort of a folder used as a staging area, however in a extra decentralized method. Smart contract to track file specifications, size, type, up-loader, file hash. https://store.devbank.dev/ is built with JavaScript to ensure smart contracts are accomplishing the expected functionalities. Storage¬≥ permits the to add a file to a decentralized system referred to as IPFS/Filecoin System, sharing it with anybody who knows of the hash identifier. The file ownership is tracked on the blockchain. It refers to the hash, not showing the content!
